content: --- ***holiday season is here *** *this is the perfect mini sweater to decorate your tree or to make a lovely holiday garland perfect little in-between project for almost instant gratification * --- ***yarn *** 1 skein or mini skein of merino singles by la bien aimée or adelaide by primrose yarn co approx 80 yds 75 m of fingering weight yarn *the samples were knit in colorways malachite la bien aimée green and short skirt long jacket primrose yarn co light speckle * ***finished chest circumference *** 5½ 14 cm
